characters: Driver of the self-driving vehicle, person on a red scooter, person on a black scooter
summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is navigating through a busy urban street. Initially, a person on a red scooter is seen moving from the left side of the frame towards the center. As the vehicle progresses, another person on a black scooter appears from the right side and moves towards the center of the road. The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while observing the movements of these individuals.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and direction, carefully monitoring the movements of the individuals on the scooters. The vehicle does not make any sudden changes in speed or direction, indicating a cautious approach to avoid potential collisions.
key_objects: 1) Left side: Person on a red scooter, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the center of the road. 2) Right side: Person on a black scooter, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the center of the road.
